column1: Smoque BBQ////Sweet Jesus! I haven't reviewed Smoque yet? Well
column2: it all started at a friend's birthday party
column5: he told me about this wonderful place that sold amazing bbq and brisket. He even had some at the party
column6: what luck! I tried the brisket and it was amazing. The mac and cheese...mouthwatering. I had to have more. I had to be sure it wasn't a fluke.
